dict.string:
Your folder is full. <font color="yellow">(Units owned: %d / Limit: %d)</font>
Enhance or sell units to clear some space, or spend polygons to expand your folder.

Your folder is full. <font color="yellow">(Units owned: %d / Limit: %d)</font>
Enhance or sell units to clear some space, or purchase polygons to expand your folder.

Use 10 polygons to expand your folder by 5 slots.
Are you sure?
